title: Amy's King
description: I lost everyone I’ve ever loved, all but one.Amy was all I had left, but she’s forbidden fruit.Should I endanger all I have left for a chance at true happiness,or should I play it safe and maybe lose my chance at happy ever after?I became Amy’s guardian after her mom and dad, my best friends, passed away.She’s all I have... I’m all she has.I know what I feel for her is not what a man my age should feel for a girl Amy’s age.Should I accept things as they are or should I fight for something more?
author: Sophia White
